pageContext.description: Fragment consisting of part of socket and loop. Bad casting, for on the fractured face are numerous air bubbles.
pageContext.associations: Part of a large hoard; see card for first socketed celt.
pageContext.publications: Arch. Journ. XXX, 279,Jessup, Arch of Kent, 107,Evans,Journ. Anhtop. Inst. III, 230.
pageContext.collection: Mr. Lemmon, Saltwood.,Dead, before 1957, his portion went perhaps to Hythe Museum?
pageContext.site: England,Kent,Saltwood,Hayne Wood, on line of railway cutting, 6 ft. below surface, lying on stratum of sand, c. 25 yards NW by N of summit of hill. Found June 4, 1872
pageContext.toSearch: Saltwood, Hythe, Hythe, Kent Ct21, UK
